resources.string: Key length must be at least 3 characters.
Passcode must have at least 2 characters.
Encryption key not set. Please check settings.
Encryption Key (use a complex one, e.g., "jn@32+iQm9")
Source code will be available on GitHub

The app will lock if there is no activity for a few minutes. Set to 0 for immediate locking.
Changing the theme or language requires restarting the app.
